backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and component layers defining OKLCH theme variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing game state, question flow, progression, and UI layout.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholderBan: Simple bottom banner placeholder for future ads.
frontend/src/components/GameHeader.tsx: Header with logo, level badge, share button, and music toggle.
frontend/src/components/LevelUpOverlay.t: Dialog overlay showing level-up celebration with continue and share actions.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Wrapper around UI progress bar displaying percent toward next level.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Renders question text and answers with correct/wrong feedback and locking behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Hook managing looping background music playback and mute toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity state, and exposing login/clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpenTdbQuestion.ts: Custom hook that fetches a trivia question from OpenTDB with retry logic and exposes loading state and a reload function.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/opentdb.ts: Implements OpenTDB API integration including session token handling, question fetching, HTML decoding, and answer shuffling.
frontend/src/lib/persistence.ts: Handles loading and saving game progress to localStorage using a fixed storage key.
frontend/src/lib/progression.ts: Defines level progression logic, goal calculation, progress percentage, and applying answer results to update state.
frontend/src/lib/share.ts: Provides score-sharing via Web Share API with clipboard fallback and user notifications.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, radii, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the trivia appâ€™s purpose, architecture, image requirements, and implemented feature set.
